column4: i was able to access gnome-diplay-properties.... but im not able to apply the settings

i really dont want to use gnome's interface i prefer fluxbox... everything is so convienant but if you cant use dual displays thats garbage... is there a manual way to override these settings in like a conf file or something?
is your fluxbox configured for dual display support?
i think you need fluxbox with xinerama enabled or some such, you could always ask in #fluxbox though
